strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Cecil came to regret his part in the mission to seize a Crystal from innocent people by order of the king. However, while yet mired in these uneasy contemplations, he was soon ordered to go on another mission, this time to deliver a special item to the summoner village of Mist. After Cecil and his good friend Kain arrived at Mist, they both watched the village burn to the ground courtesy of an incendiary bomb—the very item they had delivered.
strings.fusion: I wish to use this power to aid others, even if my powers as a dark knight make them uneasy...
strings.summon:
I am a dark knight.
The dark power I possess may not suffice to face true evil...

strings.evolution: I have no intention of allowing the darkness to consume me. I shall not commit vile acts, no matter who gives the order!
strings.affinity: If my powers as a dark knight can aid you in your endeavors, then allow me to continue fighting with you!
strings.description: A dark knight who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. At first forming doubts about the king of Baron's unjust deeds toward surrounding lands, then witnessing firsthand the destruction of the summoner village Mist by an incendiary bomb the king himself had ordered sent there, Cecil decided to defect from his country. He was also forced to part ways with his loyal friend Kain, who had accompanied him to Mist. However, Cecil did befriend a survivor of the village named Rydia, and together they set off to the oasis town of Kaipo.
strings.fusion: The day will come when I will have to stay true to my heart. I can feel it.
strings.summon: I shall never forget the atrocities I have committed. I shall wear this burden along with my armor, and press forth.
